item.title: 100 Digits of Phi
item.description: My name, Phi, also represents the ‘golden ratio’: Φ = 1.618. This visualization graphically depicts the number, with each digit being represented by a color and unit vector in the polar coordinate system. //set margins var margin = {top: 20, right: 20, bottom: 20, left: 20}, width = 600 - margin.left - margin.right, height = 600 - margin.top - margin.bottom; var body = d3.select("body"); //misc. text body.append("text").text("My name, Phi, also represents the 'golden ratio' "
